summary: Completed comprehensive review and bug fixes for BeautyBooking module. Fixed badge criteria (changed >= to > for Top Rated), fixed consultation credit logic to prevent premature marking, added commission calculation for consultation and cross-selling revenue models, fixed race condition in availability check with pessimistic locking, added missing API endpoints for monthly reports, added missing database indexes, and verified all other components are properly implemented.
current_status: All critical and high-priority issues from the review plan have been addressed. The module is now more robust with proper race condition handling, correct badge criteria, fixed revenue model calculations, and improved database performance with additional indexes.
